title: Senior Architect
description: We are seeking an experienced Senior Architect to lead our design projects. Must have 10+ years of experience.
requirements: 10+ years of experience in architectural design.
Strong leadership and project management skills.
Proficiency in AutoCAD, Revit, and other design software.

title: Project Manager
description: Looking for a skilled Project Manager to oversee our construction projects. Must have 5+ years of experience.
requirements: 5+ years of experience in project management.
